name: Error
service.name: trader-app-web
inline_script: step('Go to http://proxy-ext.trading-1.svc.cluster.local:8081/', async () => {await page.goto('http://proxy-ext.trading-1.svc.cluster.local:8081/'); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Error' }).click(); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Browser Browser (Javascript)' }).click(); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Submit' }).click(); await page.waitForTimeout(5000);});
